---
Help: Het item in de response van GET /schedule/channel/{channel}/now zendt uit ten tijde van de waarde van de 'now' parameter op de opgegeven zender.
Suites: NPOAPI-33, RG
Test
---
!*> Test-specific items
!define channel1 {NED1}
!define channel2 {RAD2}

!define now {8-10-2020 13:00}
*!

|script                                 |
|$nowIso=|convert datetime|${now}|to iso|

|script                                                                                                                                         |
|Get                                                     |schedule/channel/${channel1}/now?now=$nowIso|and check value at|channel|is|${channel1}|
|Check item in response is broadcasting at moment of time|${now}                                                                                |

|script                                                                                                                                         |
|Get                                                     |schedule/channel/${channel2}/now?now=$nowIso|and check value at|channel|is|${channel2}|
|Check item in response is broadcasting at moment of time|${now}                                                                                |
